meanings.definition: A small silvery fish often used for food.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy eating herring with crackers.
meanings.sent2: The fishermen caught a lot of herring in the net.
meanings.sent3: Why did the herring bring a tiny fork to the seafood party?
meanings.sent4: The school of herring shimmered like silver coins in the water.
meanings.sent5: The salty taste of herring lingered on my tongue.

meanings.sent1: The cat will herring across the room to catch the toy.
meanings.sent2: She herringed through the crowd to catch the bus.
meanings.sent3: Why did the squirrel herring up the tree and then back down again?
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to herring by as we raced to finish the project.
meanings.sent5: The wind made the leaves herring along the ground.
